revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly an earlier edition of: An Appeal to Impartial Posterity, by Madame Roland, wife of the Minister of the Interior; or, a collection of tracts written by her during her..."
revision.text: Possibly an earlier edition of: An Appeal to Impartial Posterity, by Madame Roland, wife of the Minister of the Interior; or, a collection of tracts written by her during her confinement in the prisons of the abbey, and St. Pélagie, in Paris. In four parts. Translated from the French original, Published for the Benefit of her only Daughter, deprived for the Fortune of her Parents by Sequestration. (Marie-Jeanne Phlipon Roland de la Platière). (London : Printed for J. Johnson, St. Paul's Church-yard, 1796). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2435841~S1
